optOut.waitForThenClick: body > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(1)#cookie-law-info-bar > div:not([id]) > span#wt-cli-cookie-banner > a:nth-child(5)#wt-cli-reject-btn

test.waitForVisible: body > div:not([id]) > div:nth-child(1)#cookie-law-info-bar > div:not([id]) > span#wt-cli-cookie-banner > a:nth-child(5)#wt-cli-reject-btn
